texts.label_intro_heading: We use cookies and other technologies
texts.label_intro: The website uses cookies, web beacons, JavaScript and similar technologies. I agree that trusted partners generate pseudonymous user profiles for adapting the website to the user, for market research and for advertising. The generated data can also be shared with third parties while the user profiles cannot be combined with personal data. Detailed information, also on the right to withdraw consent, can be found in the website's privacy policy.
texts.label_cpc_purpose_optout_confirm_text: This setting will significantly affect your experience on our website.
texts.label_poi_group_list_heading: Your consent for companies of the group
texts.label_poi_group_list_text: Here is a list of companies of the group:
texts.label_thirdparty_list_heading: Your consent for third party software
texts.label_thirdparty_list_text: Here is a list of third party software.
texts.label_nocookie_head: In order to be able to provide our services in the best possible way, cookies must be activated in your browser.
texts.label_nocookie_text: Please activate cookies in the properties of your browsers. So you can do it in Google Chrome or Firefox.".
texts.label_cpc_legint_box_text: Permetti a questo servizio di trattare i tuoi dati sulla base di un interesse legittimo.
texts.label_cpc_legint_infobox_description:
Un "interesse legittimo" è un interesse che, in base alla legislazione applicabile, giustifica il trattamento di dati personali.
I servizi che decidono di fare affidamento su di un interesse legittimo possono processare i tuoi dati a meno che tu non ti opponga a tale trattamento.

Deselezionando questa casella eserciti il tuo diritto di opposizione.
texts.label_cpc_disclosure_panel_title: Informazioni riguardo l’archiviazione e l’accesso sul dispositivo
